+## `add_import`
+
+Adds a use statement for a given fully-qualified path.
+
+```rust
+// BEFORE
+fn process(map: std::collections::┃HashMap<String, String>) {}
+
+// AFTER
+use std::collections::HashMap;
+
+fn process(map: HashMap<String, String>) {}
+```
